short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables SSG IFS links to open via Google Chrome and sets the new tab page to the SSG Tools page, if accessible.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IFS links are by default not supported in Google Chrome.

With this extension, IFS Apps 7.5 links, both on the internal SSG Intranet and any of websites that link to IFS, will now work. Once installed, you can test this by visiting 'ifs://test'.

To install:
- Install the extension
- Download and run the .bat the extension downloads
- You're done!

The .bat file adds a few registry keys to enable the URI format ifs://, which when pared with this extension, will convert any IFS links containing .application into ifs:// links, which will then work as intended.

This extension also adds the URL format ifs://xxx which opens IFS to the page given to it.

For support, contact Development.
